Hamilton implements 30km/h speed limits around local schools https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/hamilton-implements-30kmh-speed-limits-around-local-schools/G2ZCMCNRXZFVNNORYGSDDBOYJ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/hamilton-implements-30kmh-speed-limits-around-local-schools/G2ZCMCNRXZFVNNORYGSDDBOYJ4/ Depending on the school's location, the speed limit is permanent or "variable". Photo / Hamilton City Council
Man arrested: Gun found hidden on street near Newshub office, Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-arrested-gun-found-hidden-on-street-near-newshub-office-auckland/EVVYKY2O2FAH3CTFI2BFX2QCUU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-arrested-gun-found-hidden-on-street-near-newshub-office-auckland/EVVYKY2O2FAH3CTFI2BFX2QCUU/ Raphael FranksPolice arrested a 41-year-old and charged him with firearm-related offences. Photo / Dean Purcell
Owner of dog viciously mauled by large pack on Whitford track claims dog walker had ‘no control’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/owner-of-dog-viciously-mauled-by-large-pack-on-whitford-track-claims-dog-walker-had-no-control/3ORJWIR77ZFIXHOBPOONABKZOI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/owner-of-dog-viciously-mauled-by-large-pack-on-whitford-track-claims-dog-walker-had-no-control/3ORJWIR77ZFIXHOBPOONABKZOI/ Rachel MaherThe owner says her 'hero' dog had to be put down a week after the attack. Kippa was mauled and had to be euthanised a week later. Photo / Michael Craig
